name: DycerLyfe International
description:
Welcome to DycerLyfe International. Now that you have paid a small startup fee to your DycerLyfe International Ambassador, you're ready to begin your journey towards your new life. 

You've received your first shipment of the three time, award winning, DycerLyfe International Brand 5-in-one Juicerator and today is your first day introducing the DycerLyfe Wellness Journey to your community. 

Using only your wits, charm, and a bit of luck, you begin your hustle selling the award winning DycerLyfe International Brand 5-in-1 Juicerator; but let's admit it, this wellness device really sells itself. Maybe if you're feeling extra lucky, you'll be able to spread the DycerLyfe International wellness initiative to others in your community and recruit others to the DycerLyfe lifestyle.

Dycer Slyce YOUR Lyfe today with DycerLyfe International!

CONTROLS:

Mouse - select dialogue choice
Space bar - advance dialogue
